D

dealer - Variable in class BlackJackServer
ServerSocket to listen to clients and establish connections
dealerCard1 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the first dealer card when drawn
dealerCard2 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the second dealer card when drawn
dealerCard3 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the third dealer card when drawn
dealerCard4 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the fourth dealer card when drawn
dealerCard5 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the fifth dealer card when drawn
dealerCard6 - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text area to hold the sixth dealer card when drawn
dealerCardAreas - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
array that hold the text areas in the GUI to display the dealers cards
dealerTotal - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
text field that displays the dealers card sum, it does not consider the upside down card unless it has been flipped
deck - Variable in class Deck
Final instance data member deck of type Cards array.
Deck - Class in <Unnamed>
Deck class, an object of this class can be used to simulate a real life french card deck, it contains an inner card class with attributes a normal card has
Deck() - Constructor for class Deck
Deck object no parameter constructor that initializes the deck member to the cards a normal deck holds, it assigns a type and a value to each card, Aces have a value of 11 and royalty cards have a value of 10
Deck.Cards - Class in <Unnamed>
inner Cards class, an object of this class is used to simulate a real life deck card, it holds a card type and value
doubleButton - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
double button from the Java FX GUI
doublePressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class BlackJackClientController
on action method for the double button, when the user presses this the client thread will send the indication to the server to double the bet
